data.name: ErrorCorrectCompleteAllRedFields
data.value: Please correct or complete all red highlighted fields before selecting save.

data.name: ErrorCustomerUserIdExists
data.value: The user ID you selected is unavailable. Please select another user ID, thank you.

data.name: ErrorCustomerUserIdRegEx
data.value: The user ID you entered is invalid. Please re-enter. Review the user ID help , if you need assistance.

data.name: ErrorDateOfBirthLT18
data.value: Applicant must be 18 years of age to apply for a LightStream loan.

data.name: ErrorDateOfBirth
data.value: Date of Birth

data.name: ErrorEmailAddressVal
data.value: The email address entered is invalid. Please reenter.

data.name: ErrorEmployerAddressLine1NoPO
data.value: A P.O. Box is not a valid street address, please re-enter the information.

data.name: ErrorEmployerAddressLine1Val
data.value: The street address is invalid, please re-enter the information.

data.name: ErrorEmployerPostalUnitType
data.value: Select Bldg, Floor, Mail Stop, or Suite from the drop down box.

data.name: ErrorEmployerPostalUnitValue
data.value: Enter a Bldg, Floor, Mail Stop, or Suite number.

data.name: ErrorEquityInHome
data.value: Enter the current equity in your home. If none, please enter zero.

data.name: ErrorEquityInHomeVal
data.value: The equity entered is invalid, please re-enter the information.

data.name: ErrorFirstNameVal
data.value: The name entered is invalid, please re-enter the applicant's first name.

data.name: ErrorLastNameVal
data.value: The name entered in invalid, please re-enter the applicant's last name.

data.name: ErrorLoanAmountRange
data.value: Please enter a loan amount between {MINIMUM} and $100,000.00

data.name: ErrorLoanTermRange
data.value: Please enter a loan term between {MINIMUM} and {MAXIMUM} months.

data.name: ErrorMiddleInitial
data.value: The middle initial entered is invalid, please re-enter the middle initial.

data.name: ErrorMonthlyHousingCostVal
data.value: The estimated monthly housing cost entered is invalid, please re-enter the information.

data.name: ErrorPasswordNoMatch
data.value: The passwords entered do not match. Please re-enter your passwords. Thank you.

data.name: ErrorResAddressLine1NoPO
data.value: We do not accept P.O. Boxes as the street address.

data.name: ErrorResAddressLine1Val
data.value: The street address must begin with a number or the letter R.

data.name: ErrorResPostalUnitType
data.value: Select Apt, Suite or Unit from the drop down box.

data.name: ErrorResPostalUnitValue
data.value: Enter an apartment, suite, or unit number.

data.name: ErrorResZipCodeNotFound
data.value: Zip code entered not found, please review your zip code and enter your state of residence.

data.name: ErrorResZipCodeStateNoMatch
data.value: The zip code entered does not match the state entered. Please review and correct.

data.name: ErrorResZipCodeVal
data.value: The zip code entered is invalid, please enter your 5 digit zip code.

data.name: ErrorTimeAtRes
data.value: Time at Current Address must be at least one month.

data.name: ErrorTimeWithEmployer
data.value: Time at Current Company must be at least one month.

data.name: HintApplicationType
data.value: We can only consider the assets and incomes of individuals who are applicants for the requested loan

data.name: HintEquityInHome
data.value: Your equity is the difference between the estimated market value of your home, less the balance of any outstanding mortgages, including home equity loans.

data.name: HintLiquidAssets
data.value: Includes the sum of checking and savings accounts, stocks and bonds. Do not include the value of any home equity, auto(s), 401(k) or IRAs.

data.name: HintRetirementAssets
data.value: Retirement Assets include only monies that exist today and are 100 percent vested and owned by you.

data.name: HintMonthlyHousingCost
data.value: Estimate, in the case of homeowners, of all monthly mortgage payments, including first mortgages, second mortgages, and home equity loans. Renters, please enter monthly rent.

data.name: PromptOtherAnnualIncome
data.value: Do you have Other "Annual" Income?

data.name: PromptOtherAnnualIncomeRetired
data.value: Do you have Other Income?

data.name: HintOtherAnnualIncome
data.value: Other annual income may include bonuses, commissions, tips, interest, dividends, alimony, child support, etc.

data.name: HintOtherAnnualIncomeRetired
data.value: Other income may include retirement pay, pension, Social Security, interest, dividends, alimony, child support, etc.

data.name: HintOtherAnnualIncomeNonApplicant
data.value: Please do not include non-applicant income.

data.name: HintPassword
data.value:
Your password should be difficult to guess and follow these guidelines:
  • It must contain at least 1 letter AND 1 number.
  • It cannot be the same as your user ID.
  • It must consist of only the following characters 0-9 a-z ! & $ - . _.
  • It may contain spaces.
  • It is not case sensitive (that is, upper and lower case versions of letters are treated the same).

data.name: HintPaymentType
data.value: Choose AutoPay and save. With our AutoPay option, your monthly loan payments are conveniently deducted from your designated account.

data.name: HintSecurityAnswer
data.value:
Your security answer:
  • may contain only the following characters; 0-9, a-z, ! & $ , - . _.
  • may contain spaces.
  • is not case sensitive (that is, upper and lower case versions of letters are treated the same).

data.name: HintUserId
data.value:
Your user ID must be unique and should be difficult to guess. Consider mixing numbers, letters, and other characters.
Your user ID:
  • may contain only the following characters;
    0-9, a-z, ! & $ , - . _ @.
  • may not contain spaces.
  • is not case sensitive (that is, upper and lower case versions of letters are treated the same).

data.name: HintSubmitForJoint
data.value: For privacy purposes, a user ID cannot have more than 2 individuals associated with it. This user ID already has 2 individuals assoicated with it.

data.name: FundingDateNotAvailable
data.value: We are sorry, the funding date selected is no longer available, please choose a new date from the calendar.

data.name: ACHFundingDateExpired
data.value: The selected funding date is now only available as a wire transfer. Please select another date if you wish to avoid possible wire transfer fees. Thank You.

data.name: BankDoesNotSupportWire
data.value: Unfortunately, your banking institution does not support wire transfers, please select another eligible date from the calendar. Thank you.

data.name: ErrorRetirementAssets
data.value: Enter zero or more for the amount of your retirement assets.

data.name: ErrorPasswordRegEx
data.value: The password you entered is invalid. Please re-enter. Review the password help if you need assistance.

data.name: ErrorOtherAnnualIncome
data.value: Please enter a dollar amount for "Other Annual Income"

data.name: ErrorResZipCodeMilitary
data.value: We do not accept military residential addresses.

data.name: ErrorEmployerCityStateMilitary
data.value: Company city must be "APO" or "FPO" when the company state is AA, AE, or AP.

data.name: HintOccupancyType
data.value: Select Non Owner Occupied for second homes, vacation homes, and rental properties.

data.name: HintPropertyType
data.value: Select One To Four Family Dwelling for loans on houses, individual condominiums, apartments, or cooperative units.

data.name: ErrorSocialSecurityNumber
data.value: Social Security Number is not entered or is invalid.

data.name: ErrorSameApplicantSocialSecurityNumber
data.value: The same social security number cannot be entered for both applicants.

data.name: HintOtherAnnualIncomeTaxExempt
data.value:
Example of non-taxable income include but are not limited to:
  • Non-taxable social security benefits and disability payments
  • Certain military allowances
  • Child support payments
  • Worker's compensation benefits
  • Disability retirement payment
  • Certain types of public assistance payments
  • Tax exempt interest earnings

data.name: ErrorOtherAnnualIncomeRequired
data.value: Other annual income information is required.

data.name: HintNonResidentAlien
data.value: A non-resident alien is a non-U.S. citizen who has been issued an alien registration card, otherwise known as a green card, or a valid social security number (not an ITIN).
